name: Endless Jumper (TransGame668)
description:
There a two type that you can play like horizontal and vertical, be careful if you walk or jump it. to make a double jump press space bar two times, In horizontal use left or right key the blue player to survive and jump the generated block for making a score. In vertical use the same control key just jump as possible to see the score you get. The player is purple so its different.

Unfortunately in horizontal only that can able to save your score, but at least the vertical you try is like a mini game. 

Control: Left, Right and (A)
